channel.title: Satellite (VIIRS) Thermal Hotspots and Fire Activity - ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, Esri
channel.description: Thermal activity detected by the VIIRS sensors on the NOAA/NASA Suomi NPP and NOAA-20 satellites during the last 7 days.
